data.title: bd-1bc3: protocol quality gate matrix
data.description:
Comprehensive quality gate matrix covering all 17 required protocol beads with test evidence, failure path coverage, and rollout readiness assessment.

Created docs/protocol-quality-gate-matrix.md with:
- Executive summary (gate status: READY FOR ROLLOUT)
- Coverage matrix for all 17 beads (infrastructure, protocol commands, cross-cutting)
- 155 passing unit tests breakdown by module
- Failure path coverage (blocked, resumable, needs-review, command-unavailable)
- E2E test plan (enhancement, not blocking)
- Test execution evidence
- Rollout readiness assessment

Key findings:
- All 17 required beads verified and closed
- 155/155 unit tests passing (0 failures)
- Comprehensive failure path testing
- Fallback handling implemented and documented
- Real-world integration via dev-loop and worker-loop

Recommendation: Approve for rollout with high confidence.

data.reason: No security concerns. Docs-only change â€” single markdown file (docs/protocol-quality-gate-matrix.md) documenting test coverage. No executable code, no config changes, no secrets. Appropriate for risk:low label.
